19.「だから すぐにでも 火口付近に行って| あやしい儀式を 止めたいんだけど……。: So I'd like to get to the crater and stop|the shady rituals right away. Unless you can|fly, you can't go there.

21.「そう言わずに お願いよ！| 私 ひとりでは 間に合わないかもしれないわ！| す: Don't say that. Please! I may not be able to|make it on my own! We've already gathered|quite a few demons!
